ticket.title: Force gem dependencies to rebuild if I run rake gems:build:force
ticket.original-body:
If I am running:
@@@ rake gems:build:force @@@
I would expect it to force the dependencies of my unpacked gems to build, too, not just the top-level ones I depend upon myself. Patch attached.
ticket.latest-body:
If I am running:
@@@ rake gems:build:force @@@
I would expect it to force the dependencies of my unpacked gems to build, too, not just the top-level ones I depend upon myself. Patch attached.
ticket.original-body-html:
If I am running:


rake gems:build:force

I would expect it to force the dependencies of my unpacked gems to build, too, not just the top-level ones I depend upon myself. Patch attached.

version.body:
If I am running:
@@@ rake gems:build:force @@@
I would expect it to force the dependencies of my unpacked gems to build, too, not just the top-level ones I depend upon myself. Patch attached.

version.title: Force gem dependencies to rebuild if I run rake gems:build:force

version.body: See #2678 for comments about passing the whole options hash.
version.body-html: See #2678 for comments about passing the whole options hash.
version.title: Force gem dependencies to rebuild if I run rake gems:build:force

version.body: @Graeme - can you take a look at the patch on #2773? It incorporates David's suggestion by passing the entire options hash to dependencies' build.
version.body-html: @Graeme - can you take a look at the patch on #2773? It incorporates David's suggestion by passing the entire options hash to dependencies' build.
version.title: Force gem dependencies to rebuild if I run rake gems:build:force

version.body: I'm happy for this ticket to be closed alongside #2773 being resolved.
version.body-html: I'm happy for this ticket to be closed alongside #2773 being resolved.
version.title: Force gem dependencies to rebuild if I run rake gems:build:force

version.body:
(from [2c3d2906b255b1cb3aeb5d3abb9fe2dcb2872c28]) Fix several issues with the 2.3.2 gem loader.
Incorporates the following:
- migrates back small change to gems:build:force from bfc1609a501fc3ed442685819de5bcdb5fbada1c to finish closing #2266.
- unrolls to_proc calls in gems.rake, to match the change in master.
- fixes #2722 by passing the options hash to dependencies during build. (includes a test)
- fixes #2721 by loading the specification directly in from_directory_name. Adds an option to opt-out of specification loading when needed (in gems:refresh_specs, for instance). Includes tests.
- fixes #2679 by refreshing specs for all frozen gems rather than just gems loaded from the environment.
- fixes #2678 by passing the options hash to dependencies during unpack.
Signed-off-by: Michael Koziarski <michael@koziarski.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/2c3d2906b255b1cb3aeb5d3abb9fe2dcb2872c28
version.body-html:
(from [2c3d2906b255b1cb3aeb5d3abb9fe2dcb2872c28]) Fix several issues with the 2.3.2 gem loader.

Incorporates the following:

  • migrates back small change to gems:build:force from bfc1609a501fc3ed442685819de5bcdb5fbada1c to finish closing #2266.

  • unrolls to_proc calls in gems.rake, to match the change in master.

  • fixes #2722 by passing the options hash to dependencies during build. (includes a test)

  • fixes #2721 by loading the specification directly in from_directory_name. Adds an option to opt-out of specification loading when needed (in gems:refresh_specs, for instance). Includes tests.

  • fixes #2679 by refreshing specs for all frozen gems rather than just gems loaded from the environment.

  • fixes #2678 by passing the options hash to dependencies during unpack.

Signed-off-by: Michael Koziarski michael@koziarski.com
http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/2c3d2906b255b1cb3aeb5d3abb9fe2...
version.title: Force gem dependencies to rebuild if I run rake gems:build:force

(from [41a94048e55e082f373e19d9fcee311860aaba9e]) Fix several issues with the 2.3.2 gem loader.
Incorporates the following:
- migrates back small change to gems:build:force from bfc1609a501fc3ed442685819de5bcdb5fbada1c to finish closing #2266.
- unrolls to_proc calls in gems.rake, to match the change in master.
- fixes #2722 by passing the options hash to dependencies during build. (includes a test)
- fixes #2721 by loading the specification directly in from_directory_name. Adds an option to opt-out of specification loading when needed (in gems:refresh_specs, for instance). Includes tests.
- fixes #2679 by refreshing specs for all frozen gems rather than just gems loaded from the environment.
- fixes #2678 by passing the options hash to dependencies during unpack.
Signed-off-by: Michael Koziarski <michael@koziarski.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/41a94048e55e082f373e19d9fcee311860aaba9e
version.body-html:
(from [41a94048e55e082f373e19d9fcee311860aaba9e]) Fix several issues with the 2.3.2 gem loader.

Incorporates the following:

  • migrates back small change to gems:build:force from bfc1609a501fc3ed442685819de5bcdb5fbada1c to finish closing #2266.

  • unrolls to_proc calls in gems.rake, to match the change in master.

  • fixes #2722 by passing the options hash to dependencies during build. (includes a test)

  • fixes #2721 by loading the specification directly in from_directory_name. Adds an option to opt-out of specification loading when needed (in gems:refresh_specs, for instance). Includes tests.

  • fixes #2679 by refreshing specs for all frozen gems rather than just gems loaded from the environment.

  • fixes #2678 by passing the options hash to dependencies during unpack.

Signed-off-by: Michael Koziarski michael@koziarski.com
http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/41a94048e55e082f373e19d9fcee31...
